title: Black cod with saikyo miso and sesame spinach
description: Black cod with miso is a popular Japanese dish and would stand out as part of a main course a dinner party. The creamy white flesh of the cod is balanced beautifully with the sweet/salty miso paste.
ingredients: 4 black cod fillets, about 150–200g/5½–7oz each, pin-boned
4 stalks hajikami or 50g/1¾oz pickled ginger, to serve
50g/1¾oz lotus root or taro chips, to serve, optional
200ml/7fl oz dashi stock or fish stock
